column4: can someone help me, i cannot boot into my windows partition. Grub give me error 12. I have tried every partition all get error 12 for the standard windows grub entry.
should i have any partition flags set?
no i cannot BOOT it. Grub gives me Error 12. I can view the Partition, cant boot into it
can someone help me, i cannot BOOT into my windows partition. Grub give me error 12. I have tried every partition all get error 12 for the standard windows grub entry.
